item.title: Supercharge SageMaker with Deep Lake capabilities
item.description: Introduction Deep Lake can be integrated with Amazon SageMaker as a vector database, providing a storage solution for “embeddings” - vector representations of data used in deep learning models. This integration empowers developers to leverage Deep Lake’s vector database capabilities to accelerate the training and deployment of deep learning models. In this blog post, we will examine the specifics of this integration and explore how vector databases can improve the performance and accuracy of deep learning models.
